text_block_list.text:
That one-of-a-kind running style of Silence Suzuka―― 
Training to explore the possibilities of that style had begun.
Fuwaa～… A faster pace than before…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
She's running for medium distance, but with the speed normally 
for a mile race!! As I thought, Suzuka-san is awesome!!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… Hnn…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Why don't you take a break now, it's definitely wearing on you. 
If the load is too much, let me know ASAP.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Why don't you take a break now, it's definitely wearing on you. 
If the load is too much, let me know ASAP.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Understood… but, I'm fine. 
Rather than being too tough, I think it's more fun.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
While shaking her head, Silence Suzuka had a satisfied 
expression on her face. These positive feelings 
are apparent even in her running, too.

Even though she's run so much, with her body in such good 
condition, I really wonder what kind of results it will lead to.

That talent you've got is already at a high level, 
so by polishing the skills you're not as strong 
with, it'll raise your overall status.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
That talent you've got is already at a high level, 
so by polishing the skills you're not as strong 
with, it'll raise your overall status.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
After all, what you're trying to do is not normal. 
Let's make sure we've got a solid foundation too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
After all, what you're trying to do is not normal. 
Let's make sure we've got a solid foundation too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Solid foundation… right, understood. 
After the break, please treat me well again!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Yes…!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
… Based on this, slope training has a positive effect on 
training stamina and instantaneous power-
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka in the library? Haven't seen that in a while. 
Is ＜Sirius＞'s Trainer telling you to study too?
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
No, in order to continue increasing my strength, I wanted to see 
for myself what type of training would be the most effective.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san is properly supporting me so there's no worries 
there. But, I can't just sit around doing nothing either.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
…Fufuu, you're really fortunate 
to come across such a good team.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Just watching Suzuka during a race makes that clear. Winning 
with that running style, normally it would be unthinkable.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
If you were a normal Uma Musume, I would probably be trying to 
stop you. But, for you, I have high hopes you'll perfect this 
otherworldly running style.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Right, I'll keep working on it. 
For the sake of seeing that "scenery".
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to it. 
To seeing that dream-like run, and beating you too.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, let's definitely race together again.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san!!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: Fukukitaru…?! Why are you dressed like that?!
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Is this by chance, for a new divination or something?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Wrong! Just a little while ago, 
I was training in the pool as part of my rehab!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
If I recall, you injured yourself during training. I won't 
say… luckily, but at least it didn't happen during a race.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I get chills just thinking about what would have happened 
if I was running full speed! This is also due to Shiraoki-sama's 
guidance! Praise be～…
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
Wait, not that! I heard some crazy news so I flew 
over here just like this to talk to you!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka-san, the next race that you'll be entering 
is the [Kinko Sho]. Is that true?!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: Y-…yeah. It's true…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Gununuu～! To think I'd have to face the super 
strong Suzuka-san in my return race!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
I finally recovered from my injury and felt now would be the 
perfect timing, but an unforeseen strong opponent appears… I 
sense a storm brewing at [Kinko Sho]!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
If we're talking about strong opponents, what about you? 
Fukukitaru winning the [Kika Sho] was really impressive, too.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, your strong finishes are, without a doubt, the real deal. 
It'll be an even competition.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Mumuu… that's true. It just happened so suddenly 
I panicked a bit too much. After all, the race 
results haven't been decided yet…
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
I got it! I'm a G1 Title Holder after all! Even if I just 
recovered, you better expect a dignified race from me!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: Fufufuu, I'm looking forward to our race.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Uooooo… that smile is unexpectedly terrifying…! Isn't this 
definitely a path that leads to a bad end?! Shiraoki-samaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: Forget that, hurry up and go back to the pool!
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Do you think we'll get to see Silence 
Suzuka's escape again, today?
text_block_list.name: Spectator A

text_block_list.text:
No way! There's a bunch of strong contenders this time. 
There's no guarantee things will go the same way!
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka will definitely go flying out there! 
Please show us that kind of run again!
text_block_list.name: Spectator C

text_block_list.text: Suu～… fuu～…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
That was some hard training you just went through. 
You did a good job making it here.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
When I thought about the "scenery" that awaited 
after all my hard work, it was nothing.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
I'm very fulfilled right now. 
I'm running towards my dream, and everyday I feel alive.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
That's true for me too. 
I look forward to seeing Suzuka's growth everyday.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
In that case, I have to show you how much I've grown. 
In today's race, I swear I'll run through it in the lead.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
choice_data_list: <size=35>Aim for that "scenery" nobody has seen before!</size>

text_block_list.text: Understood! I'll be off!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
